comment: Easy A. This class is a joke, it's really pointless. But it's mandatory and it's an easy A. I never went to class, I just did the assignments and used the study guide the day of the test to study for a bit. When I did show up it was just reading off the power point. Book isn't required.
Cool guy and very funny! Goes out of his way to make the class interesting. Easy A if you turn the assignments in on time.
Very funny and super nice! Tests are exactly like the study guide. He posts his powerpoints and explains everything to you. Great teacher!
Very easy and laid back teacher. He is also very nice and understands students have a life outside of class. Just learn the study guide and turn in your assignments on time.

Easy A.  3 tests & 1 final, and he drops lowest test grade.  I did horrible (C's) on all tests, & I studied and did the study guide. To get an A, do the labs. They take less than 2 mins, are graded for completion & are combined to weigh FAR more than tests. My brother and friend failed all the tests but did all labs, & got A because of it's weight.

Very easy class, doesn't explain all the time but if you ask him to clarify, he will, otherwise he will think that you understood everything. Very funny! hand in all of your work on time though because he does not take late work.

Mr. Pearch is a elementary school teacher and it is completely obvious. Asks you to read powerpoint, then reads it aloud for you. Doesn't really grade labs or any other assignments. Tests come straight from the powerpoints and he gives you a study guide. The class was too easy to be interesting at all.
Awesome teacher! I wish he taught more classe!
Dumb course and clueless instructor. Where does KSU find these instructors?

This class and instructor is a joke. My high school class was better taught than this course. You don't have to go to class, you lie about the labs (if you remember to turn them in-which I forgot a few) and all he does is give you credit. He teaches like we are kids and I really believe the guy doesn't know what he is talking about!

At first I wasn't excited about taking this class. Not sure why We have to, since my major has notin to do with health. But, Professor Perch was awesome. Class was interesting and I learned a lot. He was quick to respond to emails and started class on time. Good power points and discussions. Tests were hard, but just do the labs
Great professor! Pretty easy class, just turn your stuff on time.

This class is a complete joke and it should not even be a mandatory class. Perch read word for word off powerpoints and we barely even had class. I don't think he even knew the material as he couldn't pronounce some of the words. If KSU is going to make me pay for this course then get someone who is qualified to teach it. Kind of a creeper too.
Awesome teacher!! I never read the text because he had great PowerPoints and helpful study guides. As long as you go to class and hand in you labs def easy A! Take him!!
Mr. Pearch was very knowedgeable and personable. The book was difficult, but he made it easy to understand. Just turn in your assignments on time! This class inspired e towork out again!
